dmca.title: Google Runs Laps Around Namesake
dmca.body:
Date: Tue, 4 Apr 2006 15:53:02 -0700
From: TM_enforce <[Sender]>
To: [Recipient]
Subject: DMCA--Urgent Notice

Dear Sir:

Google Inc. ("Google") is the owner of the content on www.google.com
and all related pages.  We recently learned that a website that your
company is hosting at www.googlecircles.com contains images and
trademarks owned by Google.  The copying of these images and
trademarks is not authorized by Google, and thus violates Google's
copyright and trademark rights.  The site has copied Google's
copyrights and is falsely promoting itself as an official Google page.

We request that you immediately disable the content on this site, as
required by your policy and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
(DMCA), 17 U.S.C. section 512.

As required by the DMCA, I provide you with the following information:

1.  Copyrighted works:  Google owns the copyrighted and trademarked
logo GOOGLE, the creative layout and design of the www.google.com
site, and the various images as seen on the various Google product
pages at www.google.com and related pages.

2.  Infringing Material:  Unauthorized copies of the above currently
appear at www.googlecircles.com.

3.  Contact Information:  Please email me using this address or
contact me using the information provided in the signature below.

4.  I have a good faith belief that use of the material noted above is
not authorized by Google, its agents, or the law.

5.  I affirm that the statements I have made above are accurate, and
are made under penalty of perjury.

6.  I affirm that I am authorized to act on behalf of Google, the
copyright owner of the material noted above.

I look forward to receiving your confirmation that you have disabled
the content at www.googlecircles.com.

Sincerely,

/[Sender]/

--
[Sender]
Google Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA  94043
Tel.: [Private]
